job.title: REMOTE Data Scientist
job.description: Come work as a <strong>Remote Data Scientist </strong>at one of the Top Company that offers exceptional benefits with opportunities to advance and learn alongside accomplished Technology leaders. <br> <br><strong>Important Note: This is 100% REMOTE position. </strong><br> <br><strong>Must Have Skills:</strong><br><ul><br><li>4+ years of hands-on experience in developing analytics with machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and/or other related modelling techniques</li><li>3 - 5 years of experience using advanced data science tools such as R, Python, SQL, Spark and H2O</li><li>3 - 5 years of experience developing and deploying analytic solutions using AWS or Azure or GCP</li><li>Experience working with extremely large data sets</li></ul><br><br> <br><strong>Responsibilities:</strong><br><ul><br><li>Research, Design, Implement and Deploy full-stack scalable machine learning solutions to support intelligent operations initiatives</li><li>Conduct hands-on data analysis and predictive analytics on large datasets</li><li>Apply computational algorithms and statistical methods to structured and unstructured data</li><li>Effectively communicate complex technical results to business partners</li><li>Support and drive analytic efforts around machine learning and innovation</li><li>Work with a great deal of autonomy to find solutions to complex problems</li><li>Coach and mentor junior data scientists</li></ul><br><strong> </strong><strong>Benefits:</strong><br><ul><br><li>Top industry pay</li><li>Excellent growth and advancement opportunities</li></ul><br><br><br><br> <br><br><br> <br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br>Data Scientist
